data.text:
@hpmendoza Hi there, you may check on our website for the latest flight status https://t.co/zqtk2mvoRF
-Elsa
@KrittiAKL Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thanks. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@sophiemason1985 Hi Sophie, we do not accept hammocks on our flights and you may refer to https://t.co/4e2A7pnjbU for more information. Thank you.  - Anna
@Michael61148960 Hi Michael, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@rduane20 Hi Becca, you will need to contact travel agent for further assistance as we are unable to amend their ticket. Thank you. - Anna
@_christophe_f Hi Christophe, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@antarcticwolf11 Hi there, may you provide your booking reference and full name through DM so that we can check it for you? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@laurcarson_ HI Lauren, would you mind to Dm us your booking reference so that we can check for you -Elsa
@rglassiter We've replied you in DM =) - Chloe
@techgospel You may check the flight status here: https://t.co/3PUKvtTkDK - Chloe

@ThisIsAmerica31 Hi Kris. Cathay Pacific confirms that no passenger flights have flown over Iran or Iraq for over a year already. There will be no Cathay Pacific flights overflying Iran and Iraq until further notice. - Anna
@kriss38 Hi Kriss, mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@lenaopiniano Hi Lena, we are so sorry about that :(  Due to a high volume of calls our team has received, it might take longer than usual for us to respond to all affected passengers. 
Mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@ivynakar Hi Ivy, mind letting us know your concern in DM so we know how we may assist? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Ana58482372 Hi Ana, mind providing us more details through PM? Many thanks. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@lencbr Hi there. Kindly refer the latest flight status at https://t.co/KEMEcpzLSU Thank you. - Anna
@Shaainahdioso Hi there, mind letting us know your full name and eTicket number in DM so we can check on this for you? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@carmelatherese Yes, you are correct -Elsa

Are you ready to have an adventurous 2020? We’re ready to fly you to your next escapade. Start planning here: https://t.co/hbgMCrgeSi 

Credit: Instagram@gregstone https://t.co/zXRhDaIjPV
@SabBatoon Hi there, we are sorry for the late response. We have just replied you through DM, please check. - Liz
@DionneMonsanto Hi there, would you mind to DM us your booking reference, so that we can check for you -Elsa
@ajdimalanta You may try to contact our global contact centre for further assist +852 2747 3333 -Elsa
@Simon_Fraser HI Simon, would you mind to DM us your enquiry and share us more detail? -Elsa
@joytlilio we are sorry that team might need some time to rearrange flights. Once new flights are ready, we will notify you -Elsa

data.text: @AlvinCarpio May I know if your delayed/ cancelled flight is operated by BA? If yes, they will be responsible for your flight protection. Please contact them for further assist. Thanks for your understanding - Liz
@joytlilio please stay tune on our website for the latest news -Elsa

entity.name: Taal volcano in the Philippines expected to erupt

data.text: @AlvinCarpio Hi Alvin, if your flight was cancelled due to the volcano eruption, our team will rearrange the flights for you for both flights  -Elsa

@joytlilio Im afraid the airport is still remained closed at this moment, we are waiting for the latest info from the airport when will it able to reopen again. At the mean time, please stay tune on our website for the latest news -Elsa
@BretCas We are sorry about that :(  Can you provide us with your eTicket number and passenger name through DM so we can check on this for you?- Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@nocluemae Hi there, im afraid the airport is still remained closed at this moment, we are waiting for the latest info from the airport when will it able to reopen again. At the mean time, please stay tune on our website for the latest new -Elsa

If your original flights have been delayed / cancelled, we would help to arrange the next available flights. 
-Ella

data.text: @FrancescoSEA @JournoDannyAero Hi Francesco, we are so sorry about that, we are now still waiting for the latest update from the Manilla airport, please stay tune on our website for the latest status of your flight information -Elsa

@EiEagle Hi there, I’m afraid that team is still monitoring the situation currently and no update for your booking yet. If there's any, we will keep you posted. 
You may refer to "Manage Booking" for the latest flight details - https://t.co/SJ3OXldhv6 - Golly

data.text: @SiobhanRalfe @British_Airways Hi there, can you provide us with your eTicket number and passenger name in DM so we can check on this for you? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@DustinRpratt Hi there, We will closely monitor the situation and update online.
Perhaps you can also register notiFly message on https://t.co/ookjuE0psE so it will keep you updated via SMS message? - Golly
@cameron_parker We have received your message and replied you there - Golly
@XShopaholicPooh If your original flights have been delayed / cancelled, we would help to arrange the next available flights. Thanks for your patience. - Golly

@XShopaholicPooh Hi Winnie, We will closely monitor the situation and update online.
You may refer to "Manage Booking" for the latest flight details - https://t.co/SJ3OXldhv6
@timjtravels Well received and we will assist you there - Golly
@timjtravels Hi Tim, mind letting us know your enquiry in DM so we may assist you on this? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@cabanski808 Hi there, can you provide us with your eTicket number and passenger name through DM so we can check on this for you? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@iamtiffmaxwell In case your original flights have been delayed / cancelled, we would help to arrange the next available flights. Thanks for your patience.- Golly

@iamtiffmaxwell Hi there, we will closely monitor the situation and update online.
You may refer to "Manage Booking" for the latest flight details - https://t.co/SJ3OXldhv6
@OhhSooGood Hi there, mind letting us know your concern in DM to see if we may assist? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Arce_Alex Hi Alex, may we know if you would like to follow up on your missing baggage? Mind letting us know your full name, eTicket number, baggage tag number and email address through DM so we can look into it? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@JeffSandhu Can you provide us with your case reference, full name, baggage tag number, eTicket number and email address through DM - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@joytlilio Sorry Joyce,  our team will update it gradually. You can also refer to https://t.co/7S30beWq4a for the travel advisories. - Golly
@master419 Our apologies, Parimal. Mind letting us know your eTicket, baggage tag number, full name and email address in DM so we can look into it? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@kiwietje87 If your original flights have been delayed / cancelled, we would help to arrange the next available flights. Thanks for your patience.  - Golly

@kiwietje87 We will closely monitor the situation and update online.
You may refer to "Manage Booking" for the latest flight details - https://t.co/SJ3OXldhv6
@JeffSandhu Our apologies, Jeff. If you have reported to our staff, they will contact you for follow-up. Thanks for your patience. - Golly
@GraemeKingshott @JeSuisGonzi Sorry Graeme, our team will update it gradually. You can also refer to https://t.co/7S30beWq4a for the travel advisories. - Golly
@ryzfair If your original flights have been delayed / cancelled, we would help to arrange the next available flights. Thanks for your patience.- Golly
@ryzfair Hi Ryzel, we will closely monitor the situation and update https://t.co/Q0BetLCAkd may refer to "Manage Booking" for the latest flight details - https://t.co/SJ3OXldhv6
@lyronguemo If your original flights have been delayed / cancelled, we would help to arrange the next available flights. Thanks for your patience. - Golly
@lyronguemo We will closely monitor the situation and update online. You may refer to "Manage Booking" for the latest flight details - https://t.co/SJ3OXldhv6
@HKMarkSimon Well received your message and we have replied you there - Golly

@HKMarkSimon Hi Mark, sorry to hear your disappointment. Mind letting us know your concerns, with your eTicket number and full name through DM so that we can look into it?  - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@DustinRpratt Tentatively for today. -Vinci
@JeSuisGonzi We recommend you to check our latest flight status on https://t.co/WE0Ne31iWm -Vinci
@Efborger Tentatively it affects our operations from and to Manila only. -VInci
@Marcus_Horner Hi Marcus, can you inbox us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@HKMACAUStuff @stoutyhk @hkairport Golly is one of our team members. If in case you have lost your baggage, you may DM us the details so we can follow-up with baggage team. Sorry for the disappointment. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text: @ouijaboard2020 @MeetAnOstoMate Usually medical device is included in the cabin baggage allowance, however, if there's doctor note, we can help to request for waiver. Having that said, different passenger may have different requirement. More info will be needed if you wish to process further. -V (2/2) https://t.co/6IweuRkR51

@ouijaboard2020 @MeetAnOstoMate We are not in the best position to explain what would a patient need as we are not doctor here. However, what we do is to ask for doctor's note and forward to our panel doctor. If passenger needs any device suggested by doctor, we will place a request. (1/2)
@ouijaboard2020 Feel free to DM us with the doctor's note so we can have a look. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@dbsesism Hi there, can you inbox us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@ouijaboard2020 We recommend you to check with your doctor / physician if passenger is fit for travel and any devices he / she will have to bring along his / her journey. You are required to submit medical clearance form no later than 72 hours prior to departure. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@ouijaboard2020 For Safety assistants, please refer to https://t.co/cLx0mNsJFv -Ella

@theGingerVandal Hi Graydon, thanks for your compliment:D will feed this back to the team. Mind sharing with us your eTicket number and full name so we can lodge your compliment? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text: @stoutyhk @hkairport Hi James, may we know if you have reported to our airport staff? - Golly
@elrealblancos Well received, thank you and we will reply you there:) - Golly
@elrealblancos Hi Linny, can you provide us with your eTicket number and passenger name in DM so we can check on this for you? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@Simon_Fraser Our apologies. Mind letting us know your eTicket number and full name through DM please? - Golly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Simon_Fraser Hi Simon, we are sorry for the delay due to operational reason. There is extensive air traffic control, which is beyond our control. And the estimated departure time of CX745 from DXB to BAH would be 23:30.   - Golly
@Simon_Fraser Sorry to hear this, our team is working hard to have you on your own soon. They will keep you posted. Thanks for your patience! -Vinci

data.text: @DevonESawa Passengers travelling with travel under 12years old are able to have seat reservations in advance. You can DM us with the passenger name and eTicket number so we can have a look. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@stephenjstokes Can you inbox us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@stephenjstokes Hi Stephen, sorry that spaces are limited, we are unable to guarantee for that. Meanwhile, please note that any item exceed cabin baggage allowance is required to be checked it. You can refer to https://t.co/sd9pDz5gob for more info. -Vinci
@MichaelaAshton3 We will keep passengers posted. Sorry again for the disappointment. -Vinci

@MichaelaAshton3 Team is working hard to have them on their way soon. They will keep passengers posted. We're sorry for the hassle and thanks for bearing with us! If you need further assistance, you can DM us. -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@MichaelaAshton3 Due to security reason, cabin crew / airport team will advise passenger any arrangement. Should he has any enquiry, please advise him to contact staff for assistance. -Vinci
@jameslaustin Mind sharing your eTicket no and full name in DM so we can check for you? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@haricharanshiv We’re sorry for any inconvenience caused to you but we’re so glad that you enjoyed your experience with us :) hope to see you again soon - Chloe

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.

data.text: @MyDayInYourLife Hi Charlie, you can visit our website https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr > "Experience" > "Before your flight" & "Flying with us" to learn more about our services.If you wish to rebook your flight and have a longer layover time, you can DM us with the passenger full name and eTicket number. https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@jammythart Can you DM us with the ticket number and passenger name so we can have a look? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
